column4: shouldnt have anything to do with the video driver.. i cant imagine that having anything to do with eachother
his video driver doesnt appear to be working. he can go back to gnome with same issue and cant enable desktop effects etc
either way i dont see how that could be related. Even if he had a standard vga or vesa driver he prolly still cant move windows
i had same issue while i had driver removed and was building a new driver.
